name: Robot Jumping through Myopia
description:
A short game I made over the course of a week for Beginners Game Jam #003.

I hope you enjoy! None of the menu buttons work except for "Play."

Music and SFX:

"trafic" by MEHRA, licensed under CC0.

"Pastries Behind The Glass (Instrumental)" by HolzinaRAPS, licensed under CC by.

"SFX_Jump_43.wav" by jalastram, licensed under CC0.
